superheros.name: Flash
superheros.power: Speed Run : His connection to the Speed Force gives him plenty of abilities, making him one of the most interesting, and dangerous heroes in the DC Universe

superheros.name: Super Man
superheros.power: the powers of flight, superhuman strength, x-ray vision, heat vision, cold breath, super-speed, enhanced hearing, and nigh-invulnerability. While Superman is immensely strong both in terms of muscle power and ability to take physical punishment, he is not all-powerful.

superheros.name: Thor
superheros.power: Superhuman strength, speed, endurance & resistance to injury.

superheros.name: Hulk
superheros.power: Incredible superhuman strength, durability, and healing factor.Becomes more powerful as anger increases

superheros.name: Vemon
superheros.power: Venom also has super strength — which Brock's impressive build partly contributes to — the ability to heal its host, shape-shifting powers, the ability to create weapons literally out of nothing, heightened-sensory perception, and the ability to reproduce itself
